system.description: Any nonchaotic creature within 40 ft. who hears the word suffers cumulative effects by HD: equal to caster level — deafened (1d4 rounds); up to caster level -1 — stunned (1 round), deafened; up to caster level -5 — confused (1d10 min.), stunned, deafened; up to caster level -10 — killed, confused, stunned, deafened. No save. On your home plane, nonchaotic extraplanar creatures are banished (Will -4 negates); banished creatures cannot return for 24 hours. Creatures with HD exceeding your caster level are unaffected.
system.target: Nonchaotic creatures in 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
system.savingThrow: None or Will negates; see text
